name: Strength & Endurance Mastery
description: Raw power & longevity for combat, developing elite-level endurance, explosiveness, and resilience.

workout_groups.name: Bodyweight Strength Progression
workout_groups.description: Progressive bodyweight training to develop maximal strength, stability, and muscular endurance.

workouts.name: Pushups++
workouts.description: Advanced pushup variations designed for full-body engagement and endurance.

workouts.name: Diamond Pushups
workouts.description: Targets the triceps and inner chest while improving arm stability.

workouts.name: Slow Negative Pushups
workouts.description: Lower the body slowly for 5 seconds per rep to increase time under tension.

workouts.name: Pseudo Planche Pushups
workouts.description: Pushups with hands placed further back to engage shoulders and core.

workouts.name: Clap Pushups
workouts.description: Explosive pushups designed to develop fast-twitch muscle fibers and upper body power.

workouts.name: Archer Pushups
workouts.description: One-arm dominant pushups to build unilateral upper body strength and control.

workouts.name: Wall-Assisted Planche Holds
workouts.description: Isometric planche training using a wall for support.

workouts.name: Squats++
workouts.description: Advanced bodyweight squats with variations to target full leg endurance and strength.

workouts.name: Wall Sit Holds
workouts.description: Hold a squat position against the wall to build endurance and leg resilience.

workouts.name: Jump Squats
workouts.description: Explosive squat variations to develop lower body power for flips and high kicks.

workouts.name: Pistol Squats
workouts.description: Single-leg squat focusing on balance, coordination, and unilateral leg strength.

workouts.name: Bulgarian Split Squats
workouts.description: A unilateral leg exercise that strengthens stabilizers and enhances balance.

workouts.name: Horse Stance Squats
workouts.description: Martial arts squat variation that builds endurance, stability, and leg strength.

workouts.name: Assisted Pistol Squats
workouts.description: Perform pistol squats with light support to develop single-leg strength.

workouts.name: Weighted Squats
workouts.description: Perform squats with kettlebell or hand weights to increase resistance and power.

workouts.name: Hollow Body Situps
workouts.description: Core compression exercise essential for flips and explosive movements.

workouts.name: Hanging Leg Raises
workouts.description: Using a pull-up bar to develop core strength essential for martial arts kicks.

workouts.name: Russian Twists
workouts.description: Rotational core exercise with hand weights to develop oblique strength for striking.

workouts.name: V-Ups
workouts.description: Explosive ab workout that strengthens the entire core for high-energy movements.

workouts.name: Ab Roller Progressions
workouts.description: Deep core engagement using the hand roller wheel for maximum abdominal strength.

workouts.name: Plank Walkouts
workouts.description: Walk your hands forward from a plank position to develop core and shoulder endurance.

workouts.name: Superman Hold
workouts.description: Isometric hold to build lower back and core endurance.

workouts.name: Lying Leg Flutter Kicks
workouts.description: Alternating leg raises to develop lower core endurance.

workouts.name: Plank to Side Plank Transitions
workouts.description: Dynamic core exercise that improves stability and strength for combat movements.

workout_groups.name: Explosive Power Development
workout_groups.description: Building raw explosive power through high-speed, high-intensity plyometric and kinetic load training.

workouts.name: Treadmill Sprint Drills (8.7 MPH)
workouts.description: Max-speed bursts to simulate combat sprinting and footwork agility.

workouts.name: Sprint to Plyometric Pushup Transitions
workouts.description: Sprint, drop into explosive pushups, and repeat to enhance reaction time.

workouts.name: Broad Jumps
workouts.description: Jumping for distance to improve lower body explosive power.

workouts.name: Depth Jumps
workouts.description: Jumping off the climbing bar to build reactive explosiveness.

workouts.name: Weighted Jumps
workouts.description: Jumping with ankle weights to increase vertical power and leg speed.

workouts.name: Jump Rope Speed Drills
workouts.description: High-speed jump rope drills to develop coordination and foot speed.

workouts.name: Single-Leg Hops
workouts.description: Develops unilateral leg explosiveness and balance.

workouts.name: Explosive Knee Tucks
workouts.description: Jump and tuck knees toward the chest to enhance vertical jump power.

workouts.name: Lateral Bounds
workouts.description: Side-to-side explosive jumps to improve lateral power and agility.

workouts.name: Wall-Assisted Explosive Push-Offs
workouts.description: Push off a wall explosively with one arm to develop upper-body reactive strength.

workouts.name: Explosive Box Step-Ups
workouts.description: Step up explosively onto a high surface using one leg.

workouts.name: Drop Squats
workouts.description: Quickly drop into a squat position to improve lower body reactivity.

workouts.name: Explosive Pushup Variations
workouts.description: Perform pushups with maximum speed to build explosive upper-body strength.

workouts.name: Lunge Jumps
workouts.description: Jump explosively from a lunge position to switch legs mid-air.

workouts.name: Sprint & Deceleration Drills
workouts.description: Sprint to a stop as quickly as possible to train explosive starts and controlled stops.

workouts.name: Explosive Wall Kickoffs
workouts.description: Jump off the wall and land explosively to improve leg drive and reaction speed.

workouts.name: Superman Jumps
workouts.description: Leap forward with arms extended to improve horizontal explosiveness.

workouts.name: Explosive Tuck Planks
workouts.description: Jump the knees toward the chest from a plank position for core explosiveness.

workouts.name: Reaction Time Sprint Drills
workouts.description: Sprint at full speed from an unpredictable start cue to train reaction explosiveness.

workouts.name: Handstand Push-Offs
workouts.description: Push off explosively from a handstand position against a wall to build reactive upper body strength.

workouts.name: Burpee Tuck Jumps
workouts.description: Combine burpees with an explosive tuck jump to build endurance and power.

workouts.name: Depth Drop Rebounds
workouts.description: Drop from a height and rebound into a jump to train rapid force absorption and explosive response.

workouts.name: Explosive Side Plank Switches
workouts.description: Switch between side planks explosively to train lateral core and shoulder stability.

workout_groups.name: Functional Strength Training
workout_groups.description: Weighted movement training with available gear to build full-body strength, combat readiness, and explosive power.

workouts.name: Kettlebell Swings
workouts.description: Use an explosive hip drive to swing the 20 lb kettlebell overhead, engaging the core, glutes, and shoulders.

workouts.name: Turkish Get-Ups
workouts.description: A complex movement that develops full-body coordination, balance, and strength under load.

workouts.name: Farmer's Walk
workouts.description: Grip and core-strengthening exercise using hand weights, wrist weights, and ankle weights.

workouts.name: Punch Bag Loaded Strikes
workouts.description: Strike the heavy bag while wearing ankle and wrist weights to condition explosive power and endurance.

workouts.name: Dynamic Weighted Step-Ups
workouts.description: Perform step-ups using the climbing bar or platform for height, increasing leg endurance and stability.

workouts.name: Overhead Kettlebell Walks
workouts.description: Carry a kettlebell overhead while walking to improve core stability and shoulder endurance.

workouts.name: Reverse Lunges with Weights
workouts.description: Step back into a lunge while holding weights to strengthen quads, hamstrings, and core.

workouts.name: Suitcase Carries
workouts.description: Carry a kettlebell or hand weight on one side to strengthen core stabilization.

workouts.name: Dead Hangs with Wrist Weights
workouts.description: Hanging from a pull-up bar to develop grip strength and endurance.

workouts.name: Weighted Glute Bridges
workouts.description: Hip thrusts with kettlebell or hand weights to develop explosive lower body power.

workouts.name: Push Press (With Kettlebell or Hand Weights)
workouts.description: Press weights overhead using an explosive dip-drive from the legs.

workouts.name: Weighted Wall Sit
workouts.description: Hold a squat position against a wall while holding weights for added resistance.

workouts.name: Single-Leg Deadlifts
workouts.description: Using kettlebell or hand weights, hinge at the hips and lower into a deadlift on one leg.

workouts.name: Weighted Box Squats
workouts.description: Squat onto a platform while holding a weight to focus on controlled movement and power.

workouts.name: Bear Crawl with Weighted Ankles
workouts.description: Crawl forward while wearing ankle weights to strengthen core, shoulders, and mobility.

workouts.name: Weighted Sled Pull (Simulated with Resistance Bands)
workouts.description: Pull a resistance band behind you to simulate sled dragging for leg drive and core strength.

workouts.name: Goblet Squats with Kettlebell
workouts.description: Hold a kettlebell at chest level and squat to improve mobility and leg endurance.

workouts.name: Weighted Side Lunges
workouts.description: Step to the side into a deep lunge while holding weights to strengthen lateral movement.

workouts.name: Hanging Knee Raises with Ankle Weights
workouts.description: Engage the core while raising knees toward the chest with added resistance.

workouts.name: Weighted Bear Hug Walks
workouts.description: Carry a kettlebell or heavy object hugged to the chest while walking for core and endurance.

workouts.name: Step-Through Lunges
workouts.description: Step into a forward lunge, then transition directly into a backward lunge while holding weights.

workouts.name: Hanging Shoulder Shrugs
workouts.description: Hang from the pull-up bar and shrug shoulders upwards to strengthen traps and grip endurance.

workouts.name: Weighted Shoulder Rotations
workouts.description: Hold a light weight and rotate shoulders to strengthen stabilizers.

workout_groups.name: Grip & Hanging Strength
workout_groups.description: Advanced grip, forearm, and upper body strength training using the climbing bar and pull-up framework.

workouts.name: Archer Pull-Ups
workouts.description: Perform asymmetrical pull-ups to strengthen unilateral pulling power and grip endurance.

workouts.name: L-Sit Pull-Ups
workouts.description: Hold an L-Sit position while performing pull-ups to engage the core and develop functional upper body strength.

workouts.name: Muscle-Up Progression
workouts.description: Explosive pull-up training to transition over the pull-up bar, mimicking advanced climbing maneuvers.

workouts.name: Dead Hangs for Grip Endurance
workouts.description: Hanging from the pull-up bar to develop grip endurance and forearm strength.

workouts.name: Ledge Pullovers
workouts.description: Using the custom pull-up ridge, pull yourself up and over to simulate climbing over high obstacles.

workouts.name: Towel Pull-Ups
workouts.description: Grip a towel draped over a pull-up bar to increase grip endurance and forearm strength.

workouts.name: Hanging Knee Raises
workouts.description: Engage the core while maintaining a grip hold to develop midsection strength and grip endurance.

workouts.name: Monkey Bar Swings
workouts.description: Swing from one bar to another to improve grip endurance and arm coordination.

workouts.name: One-Arm Hangs
workouts.description: Hang from one arm to develop unilateral grip endurance and shoulder stability.

workouts.name: Fingertip Hangs
workouts.description: Hang from the bar using only fingertips to enhance grip strength and finger endurance.

workouts.name: Negative Pull-Ups
workouts.description: Slowly lower from the top of a pull-up to build eccentric strength and grip control.

workouts.name: Rope Climb Progression
workouts.description: Use a hanging rope or towel to simulate climbing and develop upper body pulling power.

workouts.name: Hanging Shoulder Shrugs
workouts.description: Engage the traps by shrugging the shoulders while hanging from a bar.

workouts.name: Dead Hang to Active Hang Transitions
workouts.description: Alternate between a dead hang and an active hang to build shoulder and grip control.

workouts.name: Hanging Wrist Rotations
workouts.description: Rotate the wrists while hanging from a bar to develop rotational grip strength.

workouts.name: Ledge Hangs
workouts.description: Hang from a ledge with fingers to simulate climbing grip endurance.

workouts.name: Hanging Toe Touches
workouts.description: While hanging from a bar, raise toes to touch the bar for core and grip synergy.

workouts.name: Explosive Pull-Up Start
workouts.description: Start from a dead hang and explode into a pull-up without swinging.

workouts.name: Forearm Hanging Squeeze
workouts.description: Hang from the bar while squeezing the forearm muscles for additional grip conditioning.

workouts.name: Towel Grip Dead Hangs
workouts.description: Hang from a towel draped over the pull-up bar to increase grip difficulty.

workouts.name: Explosive Hanging Knee Raises
workouts.description: Explosively raise knees toward the chest while hanging to develop explosive grip endurance.

workouts.name: Hanging Bicycle Kicks
workouts.description: While hanging from a bar, pedal legs in the air to engage core and grip endurance.

workouts.name: Hanging Clapping Pull-Ups
workouts.description: Perform a pull-up and release hands mid-air to clap before catching the bar again.

workout_groups.name: Isometric & Stability Training
workout_groups.description: Core-focused static holds and balance drills to improve resilience, control, and strength in combat scenarios.

workouts.name: Wall Handstands
workouts.description: Handstand training against a wall to develop shoulder endurance, wrist stability, and core strength.

workouts.name: Plank Variations
workouts.description: Front, side, and weighted plank variations to build full-body isometric endurance.

workouts.name: Horse Stance Holds
workouts.description: Martial arts stance hold to strengthen the legs, core, and endurance for prolonged combat movement.

workouts.name: Balancing on Hand Contacts
workouts.duration: 3 sets of 30-second holds per hand or foot
workouts.description: Training balance and reflex stability using the hand contacts on the floor mat.

workouts.name: Wall Sit
workouts.description: Hold a squat position against a wall to build leg endurance and lower body stability.

workouts.name: Single-Leg Balance Hold
workouts.description: Stand on one leg and maintain balance to improve stability and ankle strength.

workouts.name: Isometric Pushup Hold
workouts.description: Hold a pushup position at the midpoint to strengthen the arms, core, and chest.

workouts.name: Glute Bridge Hold
workouts.description: Hold a glute bridge position to improve core stability and hip activation.

workouts.name: Dead Hang Hold
workouts.description: Hang from a pull-up bar to improve grip endurance and shoulder stability.

workouts.name: Hollow Body Hold
workouts.description: Lie on your back with legs and arms lifted to engage the core and develop body control.

workouts.name: Squat Hold
workouts.description: Hold the bottom of a squat position to develop leg endurance and hip mobility.

workouts.name: Lunge Hold
workouts.description: Hold a lunge position to develop single-leg strength and knee stability.

workouts.name: Side Plank Hold
workouts.description: Hold a side plank position to strengthen the obliques and lateral stability.

workouts.name: Superman Hold
workouts.description: Lie on your stomach and lift arms and legs off the ground to develop lower back strength.

workouts.name: Crouching Balance Hold
workouts.description: Balance in a low crouch position to improve mobility and core stability.

workouts.name: Isometric Shoulder Press Hold
workouts.description: Hold a light weight overhead to develop static shoulder endurance.

workouts.name: Wrist Flexion Hold
workouts.description: Hold a wrist flexion position against resistance to develop forearm endurance.

workouts.name: Elevated Calf Raise Hold
workouts.description: Hold a raised position on the toes to develop calf strength and ankle stability.

workouts.name: Bent-Arm Hang
workouts.description: Hold the top of a pull-up position to strengthen biceps and grip endurance.

workouts.name: Isometric Bicep Curl Hold
workouts.description: Hold a weight in a halfway bicep curl position to develop endurance and control.

workouts.name: Front Lever Tuck Hold
workouts.description: Hold a tucked front lever position to build core and pulling strength.

workouts.name: Hanging L-Sit Hold
workouts.description: Hang from a pull-up bar while holding legs in an L-position to develop core endurance.

workouts.name: Crow Pose Hold
workouts.description: Balance in a crow pose to improve arm strength and core stability.
